text: Topeka is an unincorporated community in Lawrence County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== The community's name is a transfer from Topeka, Kansas. A post office called Topeka was established in 1903, and remained in operation until 1914. The Natchez, Columbia and Mobile Railroad operated a rail line through Topeka until 1932. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Lawrence County, Mississippi
title: Topeka, Mississippi
